data.text: @Vishen This is an incredibly important distinction. Can you feel the shift? It’s shaking alright.. but doesn’t it feel.. different than before? Listen for the worlds vibration. What do you hear?
@Vishen My prayers and meditation with you https://t.co/uYbGJ1Mw9Q

@Vishen Two wrongs don’t make one right . It’s a mistake by both leaders . Ultimately it’s the people - who’s lives have been uprooted , displaced, living as refugees , away from family & having their cities destroyed. What have people done to deserve this?
@Vishen Cannot wait to read it, Vishen!
@Vishen Hi @Vishen, your book #TheCodeOfTheExtraordinaryMind in spanish has many little mistakes that it shouldn't have. I could help you correct it. It’s a great book. 👍
@Vishen Please stop pretending the political leaders are some sort of hero’s. Ukraine has been crooked for many, many years, as have politicians everywhere else.

@Vishen I wish it would be true for my country as well (Germany). There is huge solidarity with Ukraine, but there are also threats & hate against Russians living here, against their businesses or homes. And some med seems to have claimed to stop treating Russians. - Praying 4 change.🙏
@Vishen I had no idea! You must have been very young! Such a huge decision at that age!

I don’t know how this will end - but my team and I are doing everything we can to support the brave people of Ukraine. And I’m proud to see how the Western world has united behind this cause. My prayers are with Ukraine tonight 🇺🇦🙏
The Russian people are not the enemy but victims of Putin’s evil and propaganda. And Ukrainians and their heroic leaders have become global symbols of courage.
